questions.question: Considering the overall appearance of the packaging, what is the primary color scheme utilized to present the product information?
Observing the text blocks, what descriptive term is prominently displayed to denote the product's quality?
Focusing on the nutritional details, what specific vitamin is explicitly mentioned as being included in the product?
Based on the visible text, what processing method is indicated to have been used in the product's preparation?
Examining the nutritional panel, what is the stated number of servings per container?
Referring to the serving size specification, what is the volume of liquid stated for one serving in milliliters?
Looking at the numerical values provided, what is the total number of calories per serving as explicitly shown?
According to the nutrition facts, what is the amount of total carbohydrates per serving in grams?
What is the indicated amount of added sugars per serving, expressed in grams?
From the nutritional information, what is the total amount of protein present in one serving expressed in grams?
What is the amount of total fat per serving, given in grams, as indicated by the label?
Considering the listed nutrients, what mineral's quantity per serving is given in milligrams?
Focusing on the vitamins, what is the amount of Vitamin D per serving expressed in micrograms?
What is the shape of the nutritional information panel on the product packaging?
What is the overall texture of the visible label surface, based on the appearance of the printed information?
